thoughts.text: I will use the `google` command to search for hiking trails near me. This will allow me to find information about hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic.

This will allow me to find information about hiking trails in various locations, including Brno and other regions in the Czech Republic. I can use this information to plan my next adventure and explore the world.

- Use the `google` command to search for hiking trails near me.
